disclaimer.title: Health Disclaimer
disclaimer.shortMessage: Tap to read important health information
disclaimer.message:
This app is for informational and wellness support purposes only. It is NOT a substitute for professional medical or mental health care.

If you're experiencing a health crisis or emergency, contact your local emergency services or healthcare provider immediately.

Always consult qualified healthcare professionals for medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. The content in this app should not be used as a substitute for professional medical judgment.

Your privacy is important. All data stays private on your device unless you explicitly choose to share it.
